Players build their own kingdoms, <2>participate in token trading, and interact with each other within a <2>unique gameplay process. All proceeds from the sale of <0>NFTs and in-game assets are directed towards supporting real projects such as <3>mining and <2>green energy.

mainTitle.text: WELCOME TO THE STARTING STAGE OF POWERSWAP KINGDOM! In this app, you can get your <0>referral link</0> and invite friends to the project. For each invited friend, you will receive rewards that will accelerate your development in the game.

articles.title: What is PowerSwap?
articles.text: POWERSWAP is a platform that combines blockchain with the real economy. It includes several modules: Mining Swap (investing in mining farms), Trading Swap (trading cryptocurrencies), Profit Swap (profit distribution), Energy Swap (green energy provision), and GrowSwap (production of green food products). The goal of the project is sustainable growth and risk reduction through optimization of interaction between these modules.

articles.title: What is PowerSwapMeta?
articles.text: POWERSWAPMETA is a metaverse created around the POWERSWAP project, showing how people united in a digital environment can influence the real world and economy. In this metaverse, NFT kingdoms - farms, mining farms, and solar power plants are implemented in reality and form the basis of the POWERSWAP ecosystem. POWERSWAPMETA integrates all aspects of the platform, allowing participants to improve their kingdoms, receive unique NFTs, and create a sustainable economy with real assets.
